description: Gets a list of build IDs, with each build ID representing a single build.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order to list build IDs. Valid values include: ASCENDING: List the build IDs in ascending order by build ID. DESCENDING: List the build IDs in descending order by build ID.

nested_items.name: ids
nested_items.description: A list of build IDs, with each build ID representing a single build.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more than 100 items in the list, only the first 100 items are returned, along with a unique string called a nextToken. To get the next batch of items in the list, call this operation again, adding the next token to the call.
